articles.title: NBA all-time great Jerry West dies at age 86 - ESPN
articles.description: Jerry West, a three-time Basketball Hall of Famer whose silhouette is considered to be the basis of the NBA logo, has died at age 86.
articles.content:
Jun 12, 2024, 09:56 AM ET
Jerry West, who was selected to the Basketball Hall of Fame three times in a storied career as a player and executive and whose silhouette is considered to be the basis of … [+8016 chars]

articles.title: Iowa standout Caitlin Clark declares for 2024 WNBA Draft
articles.description: Iowa star Caitlin Clark, who passed Lynette Woodard for the major-college women's basketball scoring mark Wednesday night, announced that she has declared for the 2024 WNBA Draft.
articles.content:
Iowa star Caitlin Clark, the all-time leading scorer in major-women's college basketball history, has declared for the 2024 WNBA Draft, she announced in a social media post Thursday.
Clark is a seni… [+671 chars]
